entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023
